MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to dissemminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

Program_Info.Program_Categories: Education, Math, Science, Engineering, Utilities, Desktop, Calculator

English.Char_Desc_80: Scientific engineering statistical and financial calculator, with conversions.
English.Char_Desc_250: Calc98 is a pocket calculator simulator program for the Microsoft Windows operating system. It is a replacement for the calculator program which is included with the operating system, with many additional features and greater flexibility.
English.Char_Desc_450: Calc98 is a pocket calculator simulator program for the Microsoft Windows operating system. It is a replacement for the calculator program which is included with the operating system, with many additional features and greater flexibility. It is especially designed for scientific and engineering users and includes a wide range of units conversions and scientific functions. It also has statistics, financial and time functions, including a stopwatch.
English.Char_Desc_2000: Calc98 is a pocket calculator simulator program for the Microsoft Windows operating system. It is a replacement for the calculator program which is included with the operating system, with many additional features and greater flexibility. It is especially designed for scientific and engineering users and includes a wide range of units conversions and scientific functions. It also has statistics, financial and time functions, including a stopwatch.

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions: We generally are very happy for Calc98 to be included on magazine coverdisks, compilation CD-ROMs or websites, with the following conditions: Keep all files together as in our distribution files and not distribute them separately. Do not modify the files. Make sure that the files retain our legal and copyright notices. Make clear in any associated documentation that Flow Simulation Ltd. are the authors and owners of the software. Do not distribute our software as part of another program or incorporate it into other software. For more information please contact Flow Simulation Ltd.
Permissions.EULA:
You may freely distribute the freeware version of Calc98 provided you do not separate or alter the component files of the archive file or the distribution diskette. The software is not in the public domain. You may not disassemble or reverse engineer or incorporate into another work the software or its components. You may use the software for a trial period of 90 days. If you wish to continue using Calc98 after 90 days we ask you to register the product. There is no charge for registration. Registration allows us to keep you posted on developments of the software and helps us to plan further development. The information you supply is not made available to any third parties. A registration form can be found in the file register.htm, which can be printed out from your HTML browser. You can also register on-line at our web site.
THE COPYRIGHT AND TITLE IN AND TO THIS SOFTWARE ARE OWNED BY FLOW SIMULATION LIMITED. FLOW SIMULATION LIMITED MAKE NO WARRANTY AS TO THE ACCURACY OF THE SOFTWARE OR SUITABILITY TO ANY PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
